General.Name: Changshu Automotive Trim Co
General.Description: Jiangsu Changshu Automotive Trim Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive interiors in China and internationally. It offers door inner panel, instrument panel, sub-instrument panel, column, trunk, and coat rack assembly; plastic tailgate, carpet and mold inspection tools; and equipment automation design manufacturing. The company was formerly known as Changshu Automotive Trim Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Changshu Automotive Trim Group Co., Ltd. In September 2020. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Changshu, China.
General.Address: No. 288, Haiyu North Road, Changshu, China, 215500
